title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 115.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 115.1 - Application and amplification of general certification standards

State Regulations

The general seed certification standards, as adopted by the

Association of Official Seed Certifying Agencies, are basic and together with
the following specific standards constitute the standards for certification of
soybean seed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
115.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
